short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the Healthy Newtab extension to search directly from a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Healthy Newtab is a powerful chrome extension designed to uplift your spirits and promote a healthy mindset. With a collection of carefully curated and inspiring phrases, this extension aims to brighten your day and encourage a positive outlook on life.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Healthy-Newtab extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use at https://healthy-newtab.com/pages/terms and Policy at https://healthy-newtab.com/pages/privacy

For more information please visit: https://healthy-newtab.com/
Enjoy and please don't forget to  leave us a 5 start review!
